name: The Field Hockey Computer Game - PC MAC LINUX PS XBOX OUYA
blurb: The first ever field hockey computer game. For PC, Mac & Linux + XBOX 360 PS4 OUYA iOS Android - Autumn 2014

rewards.reward: No Reward
USD $1.50* THANK YOU ============================= You've helped us bring the FHG game to the field hockey community and the whole wild world and for this you have our eternal gratitude.

USD $8* BACKER \r\n============================== Access to BACKER-ONLY Forum + Exclusive BACKER Wallpaper ============================== * NOTE: USD Currency conversions are approximate only and may vary. ============================== All Reward Tiers include all previous rewards unless otherwise stated. ==============================

USD $780* E-MOTION  ============================= You will be invited to be a model for one of our motion capture sessions in London this autumn. Your skills will become the basis for our player animations which will go into the final game. You must be 18+, Lodging/Travel expenses are not included. ============================== + Get a limited edition FHG Hoodie from Uber Hockey. ============================== + Get a choice of either a limited edition FHG T-shirt from Akuma Hockey or a limited edition FHG T-shirt from Zoti Sports.  ============================== + Access to an CLOSED ALPHA version of the FHG (playable but unfinished) 1 month before the CLOSED BETA takes place! ============================== + Access to an OPEN BETA version of the FHG (playable but unfinished) 1 month before the game is released! ============================== + 2 Digital copies of the game for PC, Linux, Mac ============================== + LIMITED EDITION FHG Poster ============================== + Digital copy of the soundtrack  ============================== + Access to BACKER-ONLY Forum + Exclusive BACKER Wallpaper

USD $1100* HOCKEY STICK ============================= You get a limited edition - FHG field hockey stick based on the Uber Hockey Dark model (RRP \u00a3140.00 GBP). You will also get your choice of Shammy overgrip (black or green) to go with your new stick! ============================== + Get a limited edition FHG Hoodie from Uber Hockey. ============================== + Get your choice of either a limited edition FHG T-shirt from Akuma Hockey OR a limited edition FHG T-shirt from Zoti Sports.  ============================== + Access to an CLOSED ALPHA version of the FHG (playable but unfinished) 1 month before the CLOSED BETA takes place! ============================== + Access to an OPEN BETA version of the FHG (playable but unfinished) 1 month before the game is released! ============================== + 2 Digital copies of the game for PC, Linux, Mac ============================== + LIMITED EDITION FHG Poster ============================== + Digital copy of the soundtrack ============================== + Access to BACKER-ONLY Forum + Exclusive BACKER Wallpaper

USD $1560* LAUNCH PARTY ============================= VIP treatment to our launch party for the game in London when the game is released next year! Turn up in your FHG gear and meet the team behind the game and some special guests from the Field Hockey elite. Date to be confirmed prior to release. Travel and accomadation not included. ============================= + You get a limited edition - FHG field hockey stick based on the Uber Hockey Dark model (RRP \u00a3140.00 GBP).
